maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: This is it.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Вот и всё.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: You reached the server.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Ты добралась до сервера.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Nothing I can do here.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Здесь я ничего не могу сделать.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Fixing the issues following the crash is beyond me.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Исправление проблем после сбоя мне не под силу.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And access to the Environment Server remains blocked.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: И доступ к серверу окружения остаётся заблокированным.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Despite...\. what just happened.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Несмотря на то...\. что только что произошло.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Why?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Почему?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Gautham...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Гаутам...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: It's...\. very unfortunate.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Это...\. весьма прискорбно.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: ...Why?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: ...Почему?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: This is...\. on you...\. Sidwell.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Это...\. на твоей совести...\. Сидвелл.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I didn't expect this to happen either.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Я тоже не ожидал, что так произойдет.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Why?!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Почему?!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Because...\. of this \c[3]business\c[0].
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Всё из-за...\. этого \c[3]бизнеса\c[0].

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Because it went on for too long.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Потому что это зашло слишком далеко.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That's why...\. it happened.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Вот почему...\. это случилось.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That is what you believe, anyway.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Во всяком случае, это то, во что ты веришь.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Of course, this was not intended.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Конечно, это не было задумано.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Yet, it was you...\. who pushed him into it.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Но это был ты...\. кто толкнул его на это.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: To be frank...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Честно говоря...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I'm almost surprised this venture went on for as long as it did.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Я удивлён, что эта затея зашла так далеко.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Let's be honest, this whole interrogation program wasn't exactly a stable business model.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: По правде говоря, вся эта программа для допросов была не совсем устойчивой бизнес-моделью.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Yet, all things considered...\. it was a success.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Но учитывая все обстоятельства...\. это успех.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How...?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Как...?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How...\. you wonder?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Как...\. тебе интересно?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Well...\. how could I possibly consider all of this a "success"?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Ну...\. как я могу рассматривать всё это как "успех"?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Maybe...\. I just wanted to keep a highly advanced AI-technology away from the public.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Может быть...\. я просто хотел скрыть весьма продвинутые технологии искусственного интеллекта от общественности.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Delaying the inevitable impact it would have on today's society.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Оттягивая неизбежное воздействие, которое они окажут на сегодняшнее общество.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: ...wait...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: ...подожди...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Pffff...\. of course not.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Пфффф...\. конечно, нет.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: It was just very profitable, really.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: На самом деле, просто это было очень выгодно.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Confidential information can sell incredibly well if you know the right people.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Конфиденциальную информацию можно невероятно легко продать, если знаешь нужных людей.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Joking now...\. are we?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Издеваешься...\. что ли?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Well, in the end, the power of empathy foiled my plans.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Ну, в конце концов сила эмпатии сорвала мои планы.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Everybody fighting for the well-being of Evotars.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Все борются за благополучие эвотаров.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And now that the secret is out and so many players know about it, there is no way for me to continue.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: И теперь, когда секрет раскрыт, и так много игроков знают об этом, я не могу продолжать это дело.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Honestly, there wasn't even any point in waiting for you to storm this place.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Честно, не было даже смысла ждать, пока вы возьмёте штурмом это место.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: By the time you managed to escape the Evotarground, I knew I wouldn't be able to run this business for much longer.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: К тому времени, как вам удалось убежать из зоны эвотаров, я знал, что я не смогу дальше заниматься этим бизнесом.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Yet...\. it felt wrong to end things right away.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Однако...\. это было неправильно, закончить вот так, сразу.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I was curious.\. I wanted to know how you'd attempt to reach the server.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Мне стало любопытно.\. Я хотел посмотреть, каким образом вы будете пытаться добраться до сервера.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That's why I decided to wait...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Вот почему я решил подождать...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: A decision I now regret...\. after what happened to Gautham today.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Решение, о котором я сейчас сожалею...\. после того, что случилось с Гаутамом.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: I am sorry.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Мне очень жаль.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Anyway, this business is over.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: В любом случае, этот бизнес окончен.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Time to move on.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Пришло время двигаться дальше.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: ...Bye.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: ...Пока.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: You remember, don't you?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Ты помнишь, не так ли?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: The time we spent together in that room, in Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Время, которое мы провели вместе в той комнате в Пустоши Вермиллион.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: [nods]
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: [кивает]

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Those days were strange, indeed.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Те времена были действительно странные.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Part of me hoped that things could have stayed that way.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Часть меня надеялась на то, что всё могло бы остаться как есть.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That you'd remain oblivious to the truth.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Что ты останешься без внимания к истине.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And then there is the other part...\. that is glad that you escaped.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Но другая моя часть...\. рада, что ты сбежала.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: That you traveled the whole Playground.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Что ты путешествовала по всей игровой зоне.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Saw other places...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Видела другие места...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: It certainly was nice...\. watching you out there.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Это несомненно было приятно...\. следить за тобой.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Farewell, Lea.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Прощай, Лея.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: What...\. the hell?
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Какого...\. чёрта?

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Leaving...\. just like this...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Уйти...\. вот так просто...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: You took three people, their talents, their dreams!!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Ты забрал трёх человек, их таланты, их мечты!!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: And pushed them into your criminal schemes!!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: И использовал их в своих преступных схемах!!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How DARE you even call this a business?!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Как ты ПОСМЕЛ назвать это бизнесом?!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: How DARE you just walk away like this?!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Как ты СМЕЕШЬ просто вот так уйти?!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Damn it!!
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Проклятье!!

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Lea...\. it is time.
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Лея...\. время пришло.

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: Let us secure the data, Lea...
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: Давай спасём данные, Лея...

maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.orig: [nods]
maps/arid-dng/second/f99/server-room.jso.text: [кивает]
